items.title: Fixing Stuff Around me
items.author: Noorulhudasadaqat
items.description:
Every day we get up and think of stuff to do. We add in our to do list only that things which are our responsibilities, which we are supposed to do. But there is a lot of things, relations and lot more to fix. One of that thing I noticed is cloth section of my room’s cabinet. Although it doesn’t contains my clothes, but the clothes inside was a not arranged properly. It was my brother’s clothes he take them and just threw back in cabinet and never cleaned this section.

It was difficult to find any cloth from it, unless you take all of them out, and that is a lengthy job specially when you are in rush. So every time he is getting late he is like why I can’t see only that dress which I was about to wear.

So going beyond my responsibility I took the step forward and decided to clean it up, Yes after studying how to take responsibility with out authority.

I took all of them out of the cabinet, cleaned it up, folded clothes and placed them back. pheww. Done with it.

Now my cabinet was looking more clean and tidy. Now he can easily find any dress , without throwing all of them on my bed which was very annoying for me.

That’s all peeps
Bye-bye

stay safe , get vaccinated

items.title: My 5 Random Acts of Kindness
items.author: Noorulhudasadaqat
items.description:
My 5 Random Acts of Kindness

  1. I shared my notes containing the resources as well to one of my colleagues.

2. One of team member was not feeling good. Office boy was not there to make her tea/coffee So I got up and made her coffee.

3 .One of my friends was upset. I made some silly jokes to make her laugh and feel better

4. Made food for my Family and everyone loved the Food. Yayyyy
(here is my favorite biryani)

5. Shared different universities admission information on my page and WhatsApp status so that everyone can benefit from it
